dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Sam, did you hear the news? There was an incident at the city art gallery yesterday.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: No, what happened? I was at the beach all day.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: A painting disappeared during the reception. The police suspect it was stolen, but they have no clues.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's very mysterious. Which painting was it?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: The one with two red apples on the plate. You know, the famous still life painting by Martinez.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Oh, I know that one! The apples are far apart from the others on the table. It's worth a lot of money.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Exactly. The owner is offering a reward for any information. We should investigate this ourselves.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Are you serious? That sounds crazy, but also fascinating. Where do we start?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I have a contact who works at the gallery. She can give us access to the security camera data.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Perfect! Can we meet her tomorrow?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: She's prepared to meet us now, actually. But we need to be professional about this.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Of course. What did she report about the incident?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: She said the camera behind the painting was broken. Very suspicious, right?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Definitely. Someone planned this carefully. Did anyone act strangely during the reception?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Yes, a doctor from the hospital. He was very concerned about the painting and asked many questions about it.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: We should talk to him. But wait, look at this picture from the reception. Do you see that man in the green jacket?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: The one holding the camera? He's standing next to the painting just before it disappeared.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: This is an important clue. We need to find him quickly.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I found his contact information. His name is Dr. Chen, and he owns a residence near the gallery.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Should we report this to the police?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Not yet. We don't have enough evidence. Let's talk to him first.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Okay, but if he attempts to escape, we call the police immediately.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Agreed. Oh, he's here now! Dr. Chen, we need to talk to you about the painting.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: We know you were at the reception. Please represent the facts accurately. What were you doing near the painting?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Wait, Sam. Look, he has the painting in his car! We can see it clearly from here.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Dr. Chen, you need to explain this.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: He's trying to apologize. He says he borrowed it to study the paint technique for his own art. He was going to return it tomorrow.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: That's still a crime! But at least the painting is safe.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: The police will be pleased we solved this mystery. Great work, Sam!
